This is a simple past, present and future layout. This layout is best to describe simple situations that don't really require a long and deep analysis. Sometimes this is done before doing a more complicated layout in order to help you focus your ideas, feelings, or questions. Also this can be done after a more complicated layout to further specify a specific question still remaining from the complex layout.
What has happened in the past. What you already know. What you are bringing with you into this problem.
Where you are now. What you are feeling now. What is happening to you now.
What is going to happen in the future. Generally this is not the too distant future but the timeframe depends on the question.
